 #include<bits/stdc++.h>
    using namespace std;
    int main()
    {
    	int t,i,j;
    	scanf("%d",&t);
    	while(t--)
    	{
    		char s1[20005],s2[20005];
    		scanf("%s",s1);
    		scanf("%s",s2);
    		int flag=0;
    		int len1=strlen(s1);
    		int len2=strlen(s2);
    		if(len1>len2+1||len1<len2)
    			printf("0\n");
    		for(i=0;i<len2;++i)
    		{
    			if(s1[i]!=s2[i])
    				break;
    		}
    	//	printf("i ::%d\n",i);
    		for(++i;i<len1;++i)
    		{
    			if(s1[i]!=s2[i-1])
    			{
    				break;
    			}
    		}
    		
    		if(i==len1)
    			printf("1\n");
    		else printf("0\n");
    		
    	}
    	return 0;
    }
